review: This is Simply Chess, and this is simply my review!-----------------------------------------------------------------The multiplayer is just great. You can 1 v 1 people just with one computer and battle randoms! The multiplayer does'nt have anyone on there, i know the community is'nt dead but why is this?-----------------------------------------------------------------You can change the chess peices and the look of the game over general. Alot of variation and is very good.-----------------------------------------------------------------Playing against bots is as great as playing against another human player!There are a selection of levels and you can pick which one to verus!----------------------SUMMARY-------------------------------So for people that dont wanna read here is the summary.8/10 Amazing Chess game with many ways to play but not much online matches.
